statements: SELECT * FROM at_risk_population;
SELECT health_record_id, patient_id, age FROM at_risk_population WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, disease_id, gender FROM at_risk_population WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM at_risk_population ORDER BY gender DESC, age ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM at_risk_population;
SELECT * FROM at_risk_population WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT patient_id, disease_id FROM at_risk_population WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT health_record_id, age, gender FROM at_risk_population WHERE disease_id IN (1, 3) AND age BETWEEN 30 AND 60;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM at_risk_population WHERE disease_id = 2 GROUP BY gender;
SELECT patient_id, demographic_id, disease_id, age, gender FROM at_risk_population WHERE age < 40 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-01-01';
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE first_name = 'John' AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Patients WHERE date_of_birth > '1980-01-01';
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords WHERE diagnosis = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM Patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, diagnosis FROM Patients JOIN HealthRecords ON Patients.patient_id = HealthRecords.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE disease = 'Diabetes';
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM demographic_information WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_id, risk_score FROM at_risk_population WHERE risk_level = 'High' ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT patient_id, disease, diagnosis_date FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT h.patient_id, d.age, d.gender, h.disease FROM health_records h JOIN demographic_information d ON h.patient_id = d.patient_id ORDER BY d.age DESC;
SELECT * FROM health_records WHERE disease='COVID-19' ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT disease, patient_id, diagnosis_date FROM health_records WHERE diagnosis_date >= '2021-01-01' AND diagnosis_date <= '2021-12-31'

SELECT hr.record_id, di.age, di.gender, ar.risk_level FROM health_records hr JOIN demographic_information di ON hr.patient_id = di.patient_id JOIN at_risk_population ar ON hr.patient_id = ar.patient_id
SELECT di.location, count(hr.record_id) AS total_records FROM demographic_information di LEFT JOIN health_records hr ON di.patient_id = hr.patient_id GROUP BY di.location HAVING total_records > 5

SELECT hr.disease, ar.risk_factor, count(*) AS total_patients FROM health_records hr JOIN at_risk_population ar ON hr.patient_id = ar.patient_id GROUP BY hr.disease, ar.risk_factor ORDER BY total_patients DESC
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis_date FROM HealthRecords ORDER BY diagnosis_date DESC;
SELECT disease_id, disease_name, severity_level FROM Diseases WHERE severity_level > 5;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender, ethnicity FROM DemographicInformation WHERE age < 30;
SELECT * FROM AtRiskPopulations WHERE risk_score BETWEEN 30 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis_date FROM HealthRecords WHERE diagnosis_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DemographicInformation.patient_id, age, gender, ethnicity, disease_name FROM DemographicInformation JOIN Diseases ON DemographicInformation.patient_id = Diseases.disease_id;

SELECT DemographicInformation.patient_id, age, gender, disease_name, risk_factor FROM DemographicInformation JOIN Diseases ON DemographicInformation.patient_id = Diseases.disease_id JOIN AtRiskPopulations ON Diseases.disease_id = AtRiskPopulations.patient_id;
SELECT disease_name, severity_level FROM Diseases ORDER BY severity_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords;
SELECT diagnosis, record_date FROM HealthRecords WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT outbreak_date, affected_population, disease_name FROM DiseaseOutbreaks ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, age, gender, ethnicity FROM DemographicInformation WHERE age > 50;
SELECT population_size, at_risk_percentage FROM PopulationStatistics WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT * FROM HealthRecords ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM HealthRecords WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%Cancer%' AND record_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, age, gender FROM DemographicInformation INNER JOIN RiskFactors ON DemographicInformation.patient_id = RiskFactors.patient_id WHERE RiskFactors.risk_factor = 'Hypertension';
SELECT disease_name, outbreak_date FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE outbreak_date BETWEEN '2019-01-01' AND '2020-01-01';
SELECT region, population_size FROM PopulationStatistics WHERE at_risk_percentage > 5.0 ORDER BY population_size DESC;
